reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars holiday feels and smutty fun!
reviews.reviewText: I love the captivating holiday storyline and the amazing holiday smut! The feels and fun are so good! The end was just a bit abrupt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I thought this was just going to be another cheesy Christmas novella, but boy was I wrong.This book was amazing!! So much smut, and longing, and suspense and goofy laughter.I seriously cannot wait for book 2!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I’m gonna need the next CBU book ASAP
reviews.reviewText: How are you gonna leave me hanging like that, Hailey!? I devoured this spicy little novella all before I finished my second cup of morning coffee if that tells you how much I enjoyed it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A fun, spicy holiday read
reviews.reviewText: Love Hailey Dickert’s writing style. All 3 of her books I’ve read in 1 sitting because I couldn’t put them down. This one is no exception! MML was a really fun read with excellent characters and great spice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A fun novella
reviews.reviewText: “𝒀𝒐𝒖’𝒓𝒆 𝒉𝒂𝒓𝒅𝒆𝒓 𝒕𝒐 𝒈𝒆𝒕 𝒐𝒖𝒕 𝒐𝒇 𝒎𝒚 𝒔𝒚𝒔𝒕𝒆𝒎 𝒕𝒉𝒂𝒏 𝑰 𝒕𝒉𝒐𝒖𝒈𝒉𝒕 𝒚𝒐𝒖’𝒅 𝒃𝒆.”“𝑩𝒂𝒄𝒌 𝒂𝒕 𝒚𝒂, 𝑪𝒐𝒂𝒄𝒉.”Rating: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Spice: 🔥🔥Relationship: MW (primary), MWM (spicy scene only)Tropes/content: Holiday novella (Christmas), bi-rep, age gap (10 years), coach/cheerleader, threesome, sister's ex/ex's sister, forced proximity, one bed, forbiddenSeries: Crystal Bay University #1.5⚠️Check triggers⚠️After breaking up with her toxic girlfriend, Andi decides to make a Christmas to do list with some naughty and nice tasks to get into the holiday spirit. She makes a bet with her best friend that the person who loses has to streak after the bowl game for their college football team. With her Christmas spirit back, Andi is excited to fly to her family's cabin, only to find out her flight is canceled and she has no chance of completing the list. But her luck changes when she runs into the football coach for her university who is in desperate need a break and some naughty Christmas cheer.This is a December read I was looking forward to. There's something about the coach/athlete trope that I really like. Mix that with a MWM scene and I could not wait to get my hands on this book.I liked this story, but it took some time for me to fully get on board with it. The reason for this was Andi. I love a strong heroine who is confident in who she is. I love when heroine's don't care if they're "too much" because they know there's nothing wrong with that. That being said, Andi was doing the absolute most in the beginning in a way that wasn't fun. I think this was mostly because of how she was written in the beginning. To me, it felt like Hailey wanted it to come across that Andi was funny, confident, strong, and carefree, but was overcompensating by making Andi do and say wild things. It felt forced and I don't love that. However, I think as the story progressed, Andi felt more authentic and true to herself as a character. She was funny, strong, confident, etc., without doing so much that she felt like a caricature of herself. I really liked her by the end and wanted to spend more time with her.I liked the spice, but I wish there was a little more. I loved the threesome scene. It was hot. Imagine being between Knox and Porter 😍🥵 I will say I was unprepared for Porter to LICK KNOX. Omg I was shocked to my core, but I loved it. It made me want more.I'm not a big fan when stories end on a cliffhanger, but I'm excited to find out what what happens next with this couple.Thank you Hailey for the early copy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I need more of these two!
reviews.reviewText: What a fun holiday read about two people who shouldn’t be attracted to each other, but have an amazing connection. Things to look for in this book:🎄 Holiday novella🎄 Age gap🎄 Grumpy/sunshine🎄 One bed🎄 Sister’s ex-boyfriend🎄 Coach/student🎄 MFM scene (holy hotness)🎄 Naughty to do list🎄 Bisexual repWhen Andi and Porter’s plans get derailed and they are forced to stay in their college town for the holidays. And unfortunately for them, things keep pushing them together. And when Andi needs someone to help he with her naughty holiday to do list, Porter volunteers himself as tribute.And what fun these two have! From all their naughty shenanigans, to all of the fun banter they have between them, these two are so full of good times and chemistry!I also love the friendly competition between Andi and Stella - and the absolute crazy things that they came up with for this list! They had me laughing out loud.My only complaint is that I felt this ended on a happy for now, but no real happily ever after. I’m hoping that we get a full novel between these two to really dive into everything that they are working against them and to see if they have what it takes for a real relationship!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HO HO HO MERRY CHRISTMAS
reviews.reviewText: Rating: 10/10⭐️Spice: 3/5🌶Tropes: forced proxy; age gap; forbidden (coach x cheerleader) ; Holiday Novella;Favorite Quote: “I play to win, Andi. If I ever blow it, it’ll be on purpose.”Dear Santa, all I want for Christmas is Porter with a side of Knox. I promise I've been a VERY good girlAndi just broke up with her toxic ex GF and is really struggling with the breakup so her and her bestie create a mischief list for them to do over the Christmas break including all sorts of fun and scandalous tasks but when she can't go home for Christmas she thinks the list is never going to happen but in swoops the coach of the football team she cheers for to save the day.HOLIDAY NOVELLA PERFECTION.That's truly all i need to write here because my words will not do this novella justice.Character Chemistry?✔Angsty Tension? ✔Impeccable banter? ✔Hilarious Christmas puns? ✔HOT as sin spice? ✔✔✔✔✔Y'all I'm not even joking this was everything I could of ever wanted and more. I loved Porter SM and how grumpy he was but once he let his walls down he truly was such a good time & y'alllllll Andi was so spunky and confident and quick witted I WAS OBSESSED. I'm such a sloot for a confident witty FMC. The list? perfection? The game of truth or lie? HOT. just everything about this book screams I might be on the naughty list but i'm still a good girl.this is book two in a series but you do NOT need to read book 1 to enjoy this one. it can 100% be a standalone

Thank you to Hailey Dickert for the early copy of Merry Mischief List!When cheerleader, Andi, gets stranded at college for Christmas after bad weather cancels her flight home, she runs into Porter, the (also-stranded) coach of the football team, at the airport bar. The idea of getting stuck alone for Christmas in one of the least Christmas-y places (Florida) puts a damper on the spicy holiday to-do list she has planned. The only upside is she may have just found the perfect candidate to help her with her list.This was such a fun novella with all the smutty Christmas goodness you could ask for and I absolutely loved it. I can’t wait for y’all to experience the Triple Gumdrop Tower! I would love to see more of these characters in the future of the Crystal Bay University series. He calls her cupcake and I think it’s super cute. Also as an Australian, I kind of loved that it was a Christmas book without snow, I feel like this never happens.But seriously, I cannot recommend this one enough! I can’t wait to get a physical copy so I can annotate it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good but I wish there was a wrap up
reviews.reviewText: The book is entertaining but there’s no warning that it doesn’t end. Also the disclaimer of MFM was not in the beginning but at the end.

I really loved this book, yet again Hailey did not disappoint. Merry Mischief List is the perfect dose of holiday smut!This novella is a super quick read, you’ll find yourself not wanting to put it down.
